document_name: Decree N° 2.19.721 establishing the National Climate Change and Biodiversity Commission
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MAR/2020/MAR-2020-07-05-Decree N° 2.19.721 establishing the National Climate Change and Biodiversity Commission_138de566cd5472062725d90766becb17.pdf
document_description: This decree creates the National Climate Change and Biodiversity Commission, under the scope of the Department of the Environment. The Commission aims to enable consultation, coordination, monitoring of commitments, and is reinforced by a range of committees. The decree further details the Commission's composition, prerogatives and functioning. A subnational framework for climate-related efforts is also set by the decree.
